who sang how long has this been going on song

Recorded 3 May 1995.\n', 'BULLET::::- Sarah Vaughan recorded the song on her album "How Long Has This Been Going On?" (1978). Musicians on the recording were pianist Oscar Peterson, guitarist Joe Pass, bassist Ray Brown, and drummer Louis Bellson.\n', 'How Long Has This Been Going On? is a 1978 studio album by Sarah Vaughan accompanied by a quartet led by Oscar Peterson. \n', 'Van Morrison recorded the song on his 1995 album "How Long Has This Been Going On".\n', '"Been a Long Time" is a song by Australian recording artist Wes Carr. It was released for digital download on 10 June 2011.\n', '"Leavin\'s Been a Long Time Comin\'" is a song recorded by American country music group Shenandoah. It was released in November 1992 as the third and final single from their album "Long Time Comin\'". It peaked at number 15 in the United States, and number 24 in Canada. This song was written by Charlie Craig, Stowe Dailey and Mike McGuire.\n', 'BULLET::::- "How Long Has This Been Going On" (Van Morrison album) (1996)\n', 'How Long Has This Been Going On is the twenty-fourth studio album by Northern Irish singer-songwriter Van Morrison, "with Georgie Fame and Friends", released in December 1995 (see 1995 in music) in the UK. "How Long Has This Been Going On?" is a 1927 song by George and Ira Gershwin.
BULLET::::- 1995: "How Long Has This Been Going On" – Van Morrison, Georgie Fame and Pee Wee Ellis. Recorded 3 May 1995.

How Long Has This Been Going On? is a 1978 studio album by Sarah Vaughan accompanied by a quartet led by Oscar Peterson.

"Been a Long Time" is a song by Australian recording artist Wes Carr. It was released for digital download on 10 June 2011.
"Leavin's Been a Long Time Comin'" is a song recorded by American country music group Shenandoah. It was released in November 1992 as the third and final single from their album "Long Time Comin'". It peaked at number 15 in the United States, and number 24 in Canada. This song was written by Charlie Craig, Stowe Dailey and Mike McGuire.

How Long Has This Been Going On is the twenty-fourth studio album by Northern Irish singer-songwriter Van Morrison, "with Georgie Fame and Friends", released in December 1995 (see 1995 in music) in the UK. It charted at #1 on Top Jazz Albums.
